Content:
Reap the battlefield, dealing [1] to enemies in an arc.
Slain enemies provide a permanent, stacking damage bonus and restore source points.

Fire a concentrated mass of energy at a target, dealing [1] in a [2] radius.
Applies any active rune effects on hit.

Leap forward and slam the almighty Anvilmar into the ground, cracking the earth for [1] in a [2] radius, and knocking targets up.
Targets landing take [3] to [4] damage upon landing, depending on the launch height.
The impact radius begins where from your anvil hits the ground, which is 2m infront of your landing position.
Spin forward with the <font color='#c5a65a'>Warchief's Halberd</font>, hitting enemies in a [1] radius for [2].
Swap between two-handed and single-handed styles with the <font color='#c5a65a'>[Key:WPN_UNIQUE_LLWEAPONEX_Bokken_1H_A_DisplayName]</font>.

As is written on Gnak's Spell Scroll:
"Me no spell
hit bad with biggem
biggo boom!"
Repeating the words activates the magic within the scroll. Smashing something with the scroll will then explode a random, basic spell.
Possible spells include most starting spells, both hostile and beneficial (Fortity vs. Contamination), with a smaller chance at an adept or greater spell.

Swap your stance with the Warchief's Halberd, going between spear and axe mode.
In Spear Mode, the halberd has increased range, critical damage, and applies Warchief's Mark on hit.
In Axe Mode, the halberd has reduced range, increased damage, and consumes Warchief's Mark to deal [1].

Instantly warp to any hidden enemy and strike a grievous blow for [1].
Gain Invisibility if the target was Invisible.
Targets hit become marked, preventing Invisibility for 1 turn.

Use the Runic Cannon to absorb the elements of a target area.
The Runic Cannon then activates any associated runes, granting various bonuses.

Fire a massive wave of energy in a line, dealing [1] to targets and inflicting a random elemental status ailment.
After the beam expires, the remaining energy explodes in a [2] radius around you, dealing [3] and applying any active rune effects.
Depletes the energy in the Runic Cannon.

Extend the Power Pole to great lengths, smashing it down upon everything infront of you for [1].
Targets hit become Dizzy, causing actions to take 1 additional AP.
Pierce a target with the <font color='#c5a65a'>Warchief's Halberd</font>, crippling enemies and dealing [1].

Throw Balrin's Throwing Axe at a target for [1].
Lose your axe for 2 turns, or until you get within [2]m of the target and retrieve it, dealing [3].
If the target dies from initial damage, refresh the cooldown of this skill.
Prepare to throw <font color='#C7A758'>Balrin's Throwing Axe</font>, gaining a different skill depending on which hand wields the axe.
